item.title: CATERPILLAR FINANCIAL SERVICES CORP 10-K
item.description: CATERPILLAR FINANCIAL SERVICES CORP, which is in the Miscellaneous Business Credit Institution [6159] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 15, 2023 had 19314 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: financial - 273 instances caterpillar - 246 instances 2022 - 209 instances 31 - 177 instances million - 174 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
